execution_plan_metadata.title: Recipe Fix Execution Plan - Systematic Fix of ALL Recipes

executive_summary.problem_statement: All recipes are missing the critical kitchen_execution.orchestrator_steps section with exact_commands, files_to_create, and acceptance_criteria. This makes them generic instead of having extremely specific atomic tasks with no room for interpretation.
executive_summary.solution_approach: Systematically fix ALL recipes in numerical order, starting from 01-infrastructure, ensuring each recipe has the proper v5.0.0 structure with exact specifications matching the reference standard.
executive_summary.success_criteria: All 24 recipes must have extremely specific atomic tasks with no room for interpretation, exact commands, file paths, acceptance criteria, and proper v5.0.0 structure.

correct_structure.recipe_overview: Must include name, description, prerequisites, target_outcome, success_criteria
correct_structure.pantry_ingredients: Must include tasks, skills, tools, configs with exact_commands, exact_validation_commands, exact_config_spec
correct_structure.kitchen_execution: Must include orchestrator_steps with exact_commands, files_to_create, acceptance_criteria

atomic_task_requirements: Each task must have exact_commands array with specific shell commands
Each task must have files_to_create array with exact file paths
Each task must have acceptance_criteria array with measurable criteria
No room for interpretation - commands must be exact
All file paths must be absolute or relative to project root
All commands must be executable without modification
validation_requirements: Each skill must have exact_validation_commands array
Each tool must have exact_config_spec object
Each config must have exact_schema object
All validation commands must be testable
All config specs must be complete and specific
documentation_requirements: Each recipe must have troubleshooting_guide with specific solutions
Each recipe must have performance_benchmarks with exact targets
Each recipe must have deliverables list with specific outcomes
All documentation must be actionable and specific
